summary.para: Creates a clone of this attribute value. On creation, the cloned attribute is not set on any element.

param.name: attribute
param.para: Specifies the attribute value to clone.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Returns the element on which this attribute is set. Returns null if the attribute is not set on any element.

param.name: element
param.para: When this method completes, this will contain a pointer to the element on which this attribute is set.
